TestCase.name: testReplaceCommonSubexpression
TestCase.Resource: select d1.deptno from (select * from dept) d1, (select * from dept) d2

LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
LogicalProject(DEPTNO=[$0]) LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testMatchUntilFixpoint
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) union (select ename from bonus)

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testMatchLimitOneTopDown
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) union (select ename from bonus)

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testMatchLimitOneBottomUp
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) union (select ename from bonus)

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}]) LogicalUnion(all=[true]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, BONUS]])

TestCase.name: testRuleClass
TestCase.Resource: (select name from dept union select ename from emp) intersect (select fname from customer.contact)

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(FNAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, CUSTOMER, CONTACT]])

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) LogicalUnion(all=[false]) LogicalProject(NAME=[CAST($0):VARCHAR(20) CHARACTER SET "ISO-8859-1" COLLATE "ISO-8859-1$en_US$primary" NOT NULL]) LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]]) LogicalProject(ENAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]]) LogicalProject(FNAME=[CAST($0):VARCHAR(20) CHARACTER SET "ISO-8859-1" COLLATE "ISO-8859-1$en_US$primary" NOT NULL]) LogicalProject(FNAME=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, CUSTOMER, CONTACT]])

TestCase.name: testSubprogram
TestCase.Resource: select upper(ename) from (select lower(ename) as ename from emp)
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[UPPER(LOWER($1))]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
LogicalCalc(expr#0..8=[{inputs}], expr#9=[LOWER($t1)], expr#10=[UPPER($t9)], EXPR$0=[$t10]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testRuleDescription
TestCase.Resource: select name from sales.dept where deptno=12
LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 12)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
LogicalProject(NAME=[$1]) LogicalCalc(expr#0..1=[{inputs}], expr#2=[12], expr#3=[=($t0, $t2)], proj#0..1=[{exprs}], $condition=[$t3]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testGroup
TestCase.Resource: select upper(name) from dept where deptno=20
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[UPPER($1)]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 20)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
LogicalCalc(expr#0..1=[{inputs}], expr#2=[UPPER($t1)], expr#3=[20], expr#4=[=($t0, $t3)], EXPR$0=[$t2], $condition=[$t4]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, DEPT]])
